Package totalcross.ui.gfx

Graphics and shape related classes.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Color
    The Color class is just an utility class used to do operations in a color, which is actually represented by an int in the format 0x00RRGGBB.
    Coord
    Coord is a coordinate with x and y values.
    GfxSurface
    GfxSurface is an abstract class that is extended by drawing surfaces, which can have a Graphics.
    Graphics
    Graphics draws on a surface.
    Rect
    Rect represents a rectangle.

Package totalcross.ui.gfx Description

Graphics and shape related classes.
